author: dario-piotrowicz
message:
fix(docs-infra): improve cancel icon in top-menu search (#43600)

webkit browsers show a cancel X icon in the input search on focus/hover
which allows to clear the content of the input, such icon has small
glitches/imperfections so use a mat-icon instead

(this also adds such icon to non-webkit browsers)

PR Close #43600

files.patch:
@@ -15,14 +15,21 @@ import { debounceTime, distinctUntilChanged } from 'rxjs/operators';
  */
 @Component({
   selector: 'aio-search-box',
-  template: `<input #searchBox
+  template: `
+  <input #searchBox
     type="search"
     aria-label="search"
     placeholder="Search"
     (input)="doSearch()"
     (keyup)="doSearch()"
     (focus)="doFocus()"
-    (click)="doSearch()">`
+    (click)="doSearch()">
+  <mat-icon
+    *ngIf="searchBox.value"
+    (click)="searchBox.value = ''; searchBox.focus()">
+    close
+  </mat-icon>
+  `
 })
 export class SearchBoxComponent implements AfterViewInit {
